channel.title: JavaOne - Jagex brief
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dfg73DE7iv0
I saw this video from a Java convention and Jagex had a media briefing about how they use Java in their company. I found it very interesting. Overall its just a brief about Jagex and how they use Java to create their editors to topics like server specs, number of servers Jagex use, uptime specs. What I found interesting is how much technical information Mod Gerhard discloses, we've known Jagex to keep things hushed. I found this video some-what inspiring and it's made me rethink my development procedures. Its worth a look. Just wanted to share, hopefully the community will learn a little bit more about the mechanics behind RuneScape [s]and *cough* private servers.[/s]
It hasn't had that many views so I don't think its been passed around the forums yet.
